column6: three Oyadaw National Park rangers  found the body of am elephant in the water between the provinces of Ratanakiri and Mondul Kiri after receiving a report from fishermen.------The corpse was badly decomposed
column7: so cause of death could be established immediately. ------According to villagers
column8: about 20 to 30 elephants recently came to the O’Yadaw National Park
column9: smashing bamboo and trees before crossing into Mondulkiri.------Source and image: Ministry Of Environment
